heading: HR00131
0: A RESOLUTION FOR THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO ENJOIN THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO ISSUE OFFICIAL POLICY STATEMENT OR ADVISORY TO ALL PUBLIC AND PRIVATE HOSPITALS OR MEDICAL CLINICS AGAINST THE RAMPANT VIOLATIONS OF THE INTENT AND SPIRIT OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9439 THAT PROHIBITS DETENTION OF PATIENTS ON GROUNDS OF NONPAYMENT OF HOSPITAL BILLS OR MEDICAL EXPENSES
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00131
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION FOR THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO ENJOIN THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO ISSUE OFFICIAL POLICY STATEMENT OR ADVISORY TO ALL PUBLIC AND PRIVATE HOSPITALS OR MEDICAL CLINICS AGAINST THE RAMPANT VIOLATIONS OF THE INTENT AND SPIRIT OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9439 THAT PROHIBITS DETENTION OF PATIENTS ON GROUNDS OF NONPAYMENT OF HOSPITAL BILLS OR MEDICAL EXPENSES
